name: d3-fusiontext
description: Creating composition/ fusion of texts using d3. Supporting inline styling and life simpler!
author: FusionCharts Technologies  <support@fusioncharts.com>

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=dev rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -c $1 -f umd -g d3-selection:d3,fusioncharts-smartlabel:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-fusiontext.js -- index.js && uglifyjs build/d3-fusiontext.js -c negate_iife=false -m -o build/d3-fusiontext.min.js
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -c $1 -f umd -g d3-selection:d3,fusioncharts-smartlabel:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-fusiontext.js -- index.js && uglifyjs build/d3-fusiontext.js -c negate_iife=false -m -o build/d3-fusiontext.min.js
